content.rendered:
ARGYLE GRANT at Los Angeles Fashion Week 2021. 24Fashion TV Exclusive: Argyle Grant opened with sophisticated, patterned swim trunks and speedos in fun energetic designs. Hunky models paraded on the runway in European style trunks, shorts and lots of colorful shirts. The styles that would suit both a surfer boy on a Malibu beach and a classy man on the island of Capri.  Some of the main colors that dominated the runway were blue, green, purple and even a risqu red. Although collection also presented more monotone colors such as black, white and black/white combinations. Most trunks were paired with a matching shirt for an added chic look for the beach.

About: ARGYLE GRANT is a sophisticated mens swim and lifestyle brand from Los Angeles, California. The chic range includes luxury linen shirts, linen tanks, SoCal Briefs, and the famous Beach To Brunch short  which seamlessly transitions. Argyle Grant was founded by businessman Ryan Morgan, and has become the ultimate Hollywood Hills pool party essential. Designers: Dean McCarthy & Ryan Morgan

Watch the full show for FREE on 24FashionTV channel on ROKU TV or Amazon Fire TV

Photo by Liza Kushnir exclusively for 24Fashion TV

LAFW powered by Art Hearts Fashion
